name: PitStopSim
description:
Stage Select:

click Q/W/E/A/D/Z/C

Jack:
click 'J' when the pin is in green area.
click 'Space' when finish

Clean:
keep clicking 'J' and 'K',
click'Space' when finish

Tyre:
Hold 'J', then press 'O' 'I' 'U' 'Y' in order twice,
then hold 'J' again,
click'Space' when finish

You need to finish all stages within 20 seconds.

Credit:
BGM: 堀江由衣 - 恋する名探侦
